body.name: Flamaker Futon Sofa Bed Modern Faux Leather Couch, Convertible Folding Futon Couch Recliner Lounge for Living Room with 2 Cup Holders with Armrest (Faux Leather, Black)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: BACKREST ADJUSTABLE: The futon sofa bed has three-position adjustable backrest 120°, 160° and 180°, which helps you get cozy in any scenario. Just adjust the angle, you will get comfy position to watch TV, play games or take a nap.
CONVERTIBLE SOFA BED: This sleeper sofa can be quickly and easily transformed into a comfy bed to take a nap. 2 removable armrest can be turned into 2 comfortable pillows to provide you with support.

COZY TIME: The seat cushion is filled with high-resilience sponge, which is soft and comfy. This thick upholstery covered with quality pu leather/fabric delivers exceptional comfort. Make a cup of coffee, put them in the cup holder. Then turn on the TV, share leisure time with family or friend.

HIGH-QUALITY MATERIAL: Our futon sofa is made of smooth and high-quality PU leather/Fabric, which is very skin friendly and durable. Chrome metal legs increase the stability and can hold up to 410lbs.

MODERN FUTON SOFA: Delicate PU leather/Fabric with glossy metal legs add simple and fashionable style to your living room, bedroom, study, guest room or office. Cuddle up in the soft comfort with this futon sofa bed from Flamaker.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Crafted for convenient shipment and easy assembly. Simple tools needed and easy to follow instructions to assemble. An adult can finish assembling within 30 minutes.

EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE: How to solve your problems quickly? Of course, contact SELLER! Our professional service team will respond to you within 24 hours. We hope you can get good service and satisfied shopping experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flamaker Futon Sofa Bed - Modern Elegance and Comfort Combined!
reviews.reviewText: The Flamaker Futon Sofa Bed has become a centerpiece in my living space, impressing me with its stylish design, versatility, and unparalleled comfort. This modern faux leather couch seamlessly blends form and function, making it a standout addition to any home.First and foremost, the sleek and contemporary design of the sofa bed adds a touch of sophistication to my living room. The faux leather upholstery exudes a luxurious feel, creating an upscale ambiance without the high price tag. The minimalist lines and tufted detailing contribute to the overall modern aesthetic, making it a versatile piece that complements various decor styles.The functionality of this futon sofa bed is truly impressive. The adjustable backrest effortlessly converts the sofa into a comfortable bed, providing a convenient sleeping solution for guests or a cozy spot for a spontaneous nap. The transition between sofa and bed is smooth and hassle-free, thanks to the user-friendly design.The faux leather material not only enhances the visual appeal but also adds a layer of practicality. It's easy to clean and maintain, making it ideal for busy households. A simple wipe-down keeps the sofa bed looking fresh and new, even with regular use.Comfort is a key highlight of the Flamaker Futon Sofa Bed. The generously padded cushions and the supportive backrest provide a plush and inviting seating experience. Whether lounging with a book or entertaining guests, the comfort level is consistently impressive.Assembly was a breeze, with clear instructions and all necessary hardware included. The sturdy construction and the metal legs provide stability and durability, ensuring that this sofa bed stands up well to everyday use.The compact size of the sofa bed is perfect for smaller living spaces, making it a practical choice for apartments or cozy homes. Its versatility allows it to adapt to various room layouts and arrangements.In conclusion, the Flamaker Futon Sofa Bed has exceeded my expectations in both style and functionality. Its modern design, comfortable seating, and convenient convertible feature make it a top-tier choice for anyone in need of a versatile and chic piece of furniture. This futon sofa bed is a definite five-star recommendation! Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, great price
reviews.reviewText: I'm amazed by the quality of this couch for the price. Looks great in our tiny living room. It took me and my husband about 30 minutes to assemble. The instructions come with it and are located in the zipper compartment underneath the couch. I bought this couch the day before they put it on sale and the seller was kind enough to give me a partial refund to make up the difference which I appreciated. If you have a small living room or need a couch in your bedroom this will look great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not good for sleeping on but functions well
reviews.reviewText: I was sleeping on the floor before I got this, and sleeping on this was actually worse than sleeping on the floor. So why four stars? Well, as a place to sit, and for the price, it's pretty good. I've gotten used to sleeping on it now that it's been a few weeks, but I have to avoid laying on the crease where the cup holder section lies. It's narrow, so when you're using it to sit, you won't be able to lean your head against it because it isn't tall enough, but it's not uncomfortable besides that. Also, it is just about as cute as it looks in the pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very difficult to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The assembly was extremely difficult. The backside of the cup holder part is too big and required much physical strength to push it in between the two recliner sections. Screwing this portion in was another painful ordeal. Wondering if i received a defective product. Only reasons for not returning it back was the efforts put in to get it altogether The final product also looks pretty cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great couch but missing pieces of it.
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a small living area in the basement. This is actually a pretty decent quality couch. Of course I just got it and assemble it today so time will tell true feelings but first impressions are good. Assembly was easy however I recommend having a screw gun handy to speed up the process. It’s very sturdy. Is it the most comfortable thing in the world? No, but I would definitely sleep on it and it’s a little bigger than I expected which was a nice surprise. Only problem is this came without the middle cup holder piece and the arm rest pillows. I sent a message to the seller so we will see what happens when they get back to me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and simple
reviews.reviewText: It is very sturdy and easy to put together. I would recommend it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the price. Sits low.
reviews.reviewText: Nice for the price. Looks nice. I am using it for a small office. Sits low.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product quality is excellent and looks great in person! Really nice design and multiple colors available! A definite must buy!
